synopsis: Summary of the first season narrated by Anju Inami, voice actor of Chika Takami. Also contains a short 5 minute documentary on the history and impact of the real life Aquors so far.

title.en: Love Live! Sunshine!! Pre-Season 2 Special: We Want to Shine!!
title.jp: Love Love! Sunshine!! TV Anime 2-ki Housou Chokuzen Tokuban ~Watashitachi, Kagayakitai~
